com.jgoodies.looks.demo
Class NarrowTab

java.lang.Object
  com.jgoodies.looks.demo.NarrowTab
final class NarrowTab
extends java.lang.Object

Demonstrates the jGoodies Looks narrowMargin option. Therefore it contains button rows that use different combinations of layout managers and narrow hints.

Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
